attributes.name: Potential DCSync Activity Detection
attributes.description: Detects suspicious directory replication service (DRS) activity via event 4662 or network activity to domain controllers. This can indicate a DCSync attack, a method used to harvest credentials.
attributes.query: (winlog.channel:"Security%" AND event.code:"4662" AND (winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"*19195a5b-6da0-11d0-afd3-00c04fd930c9%" OR winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"*1131f6aa-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" OR winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"*1131f6ad-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" OR winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"*89e95b76-444d-4c62-991a-0facbeda640c%" OR winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"*replicationSynchronization%" OR winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"*replicating Directory Changes All%\") AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"0x100") OR (winlog.channel:"Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" AND event.code:"3" AND (destination.port:135 OR destination.port:389 OR destination.port:88))
